title: AgentAuth
author: Soham Ganatra
excerpt: AgentAuth by Composio securely enables AI agents to access apps and perform tasks on users' behalf, with authenticated connections to 250+ apps like email, calendars, files, and APIs. Get started now with our Python and JS SDKs to bring your AI agents to life.

AgentAuth by Composio securely enables AI agents to access apps and perform tasks on users' behalf, with authenticated connections to 250+ apps like email, calendars, files, and APIs. Get started now with our Python and JS SDKs to bring your AI agents to life.
